nonbiodegradable.中释: 非生物降解的；不能生物降解的

counterclockwise.英释: If something is moving counterclockwise, it is moving in the opposite direction to the direction in which the hands of a clock move

creditworthiness.中释: 好信誉；有资格接受信用贷款

neurotransmitter.中释: [生理] 神经递质；[生理] 神经传递素
neurotransmitter.英释: a chemical by which a nerve cell communicates with another nerve cell or with a muscle

entrepreneurship.英释: Entrepreneurship is the state of being an entrepreneur, or the activities associated with being an entrepreneur

disproportionate.英释: too much or too little in relation to something else

characterization.英释: the way in which the character of a real person or thing is described

unconstitutional.英释: not allowed by the constitution(= set of rules or principles by which a country or organization is governed )
